email_chain.subject: Inquiry: FOB Houston to Rotterdam - Steel Coils 8500MT
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

I hope you're doing well. We are looking to ship 8500MT of steel coils from Houston to Rotterdam on FOB terms. Could you provide a vessel offer and an initial freight quote? We are aiming for a laycan of October 5-10.

Best regards,
Michael Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Houston to Rotterdam - Steel Coils 8500MT
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

Thanks for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel OCEAN HARMONY, DWT 45000, LOA 190m, currently open in Houston. The initial freight quote is $45 per MT. Laycan is workable for October 5-10. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Sarah Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Houston to Rotterdam - Steel Coils 8500MT - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for the quick response. The rate of $45 seems a bit high given the current market. Could you review this? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and loading window?

Best regards,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Houston to Rotterdam - Steel Coils 8500MT - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

After reviewing, I can offer a revised rate of $42 per MT. Demurrage is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Loading window is 48 hours. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Houston to Rotterdam - Steel Coils 8500MT - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

$42 per MT is acceptable. Please confirm the details and proceed with the booking. Also, kindly send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for OCEAN HARMONY
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

Great, I'll proceed with the booking. Attached is the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for OCEAN HARMONY
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Charter party looks good. We'll proceed as discussed. Thanks for your help!

Best regards,
Michael
